authors: Chase me ladies, I'm the Cavalry

contactpage-license-request-group: Wikimedia chapter, thematic organisation, or user group & title (if any)
contactpage-license-request-use-note: Note: if we grant a trademark permission, we may list your use in a public list of authorised uses.
contactpage-pagetext-licenseabuse: Please use the form below to contact us about someone whom you suspect is abusing or misusing a Wikimedia trademark.
contactpage-affcom-user-group-location-l:
'''Location'''
* Please provide your country and city, so we can keep track of our user groups around the World. If global in reach, simply put "Internet".
contactpage-affcom-user-group-rules-labe:
'''User group rules'''
* You are eligible to form a user group if you have at least 3 members with 300 or more contributions to a Wikimedia project on a registered account that has existed for more than 6 months and comply with the [[Wikimedia user groups/Agreement and code of conduct|User group agreement and code of conduct]]:
** You should follow the [[wmf:Trademark policy|trademark policy]]
** You are independent from other Wikimedia organisations
* After submitting this application, a member of the [[Affiliations Committee|Affiliations Committee]] will contact you shortly to help you with the next steps
* Learn more about [[Wikimedia user groups|Wikimedia user groups]]
contactpage-affcom-user-group-logo-wm-lo: ''If you wish to use the '''Wikimedia logo''', you may [[Special:Contact/requestlicense|request a trademark licence]].''
contactpage-title-affcomchapthorg: Apply for a Chapter/Thematic Organisation status
contactpage-affcom-chapter-thorg-applica:
'''Provide URL link to your organisation's application subpage on Meta-Wiki'''

This is the page you created in step 1 of the chapter/thematic organisation creation guide line process
contactpage-affcom-chapter-thorg-bylaws-:
'''Provide URL link to your organisation's Bylaws on Meta-Wiki'''

Bylaw review is the first step of recognition as a Chapter/Thematic Organisation, and should be completed before doing anything that would make the association official, like opening a bank account, holding a founding assembly, or registering with your country's authorities. An AffCom representative will get in touch with you with any questions, suggestions or corrections.
contactpage-affcom-chapter-thorg-rules-l:
'''Chapter/Thematic Organisation rules'''

By submitting this application, you confirm that your organisation meets the following requirements as detailed in the Chapter/Thematic Organisation creation guidelines:

- Wikimedia supportive mission

- Geographic/Thematic focus

- Legal structure (Bylaws)

- Critical mass of active Wikimedia contributor involvement

- At least two years of activities

- Capacity, or planned capacity, to meet the future expectations
contactpage-movecom-signup-affiliation-a: Wikimedia movement affiliate (chapters, thematic organisations, user groups)
contactpage-movecom-signup-affiliation-g: Wikimedia organised group (WikiProject, community committee, etc.)
